info.title: External PNPG API service
info.description: This service is the proxy for external services

get.summary: Gets the corresponding institution using internal institution id
get.description: Gets the corresponding institution using internal institution id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The internal identifier of the institution

get.summary: Retrieve user information by userId and optional ProductId
get.description: Retrieves user given userId and optional ProductId

patch.summary: Partially update a product by ID
patch.description: Partially updates an existing product identified by its productId. Only the non-null fields provided in the request body will be updated; all other fields will remain unchanged.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid patch document, invalid productId, or field constraint violation

404.description: Not Found - No product found with the specified productId

500.description: Internal Server Error - Unexpected error occurred while applying the patch

get.description: Retrieve a product by its unique identifier.

delete.description: Marks the product as DELETED if it exists.

post.summary: Create or update a product configuration
post.description: Creates a new product configuration or updates the existing one when a match is found

get.description: Retrieve the list of institution origins for the given product.
The service retrieves all the onboarded institutions related to the logged user
Service to retrieve all active products for given institution and logged user
Service to get all the active users related to a specific pair of institution-product

parameters.name: productRoles
parameters.description: Specific role of the user related to the product.

get.description: This endpoint retrieves detailed information about a user's association with various products within an institution. The response provides a comprehensive view of the user's roles, product statuses and the relevant timestamps.

parameters.name: roles
parameters.description: General role of the user related to the product.

parameters.name: states
parameters.description:
The current status of the user on the product.
Available values: ACTIVE, PENDING, TOBEVALIDATED, SUSPENDED, DELETED, REJECTED

parameters.name: productRoles
parameters.description:
The current status of the user on the product.
Available values: ACTIVE, PENDING, TOBEVALIDATED, SUSPENDED, DELETED, REJECTED

get.description: Service that allows to get a list of UserGroup entities

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to access (0 indexed, defaults to 0)

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of records per page (defaults to 20, max 2000)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: If filter on status is present, it must be used with at least one of the other filters

Problem.title: Problem

detail.description: Human-readable description of this specific problem.

instance.description: A URI that describes where the problem occurred.

invalidParams.description: A list of invalid parameters details.

title.description: Short human-readable summary of the problem.

type.description: A URL to a page with more details regarding the problem.

Problem.description: A "problem detail" as a way to carry machine-readable details of errors (https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7807)

recipientCode.description: Billing recipient code, not required only for institutionType SA

parentId.description: Root parent of the sub product

roleMappings.description: Mappings between Party's and Product's role

urlBO.description: URL that redirects to the back-office section, where is possible to manage the product

urlPublic.description: URL that redirects to the public information webpage of the product

lastActiveOnboardingUserEmail.description: User's last active onboarding used email

id.description: A unique identifier for the user-institution association record.

institutionRootName.description: The root name of the institution

products.description: Object that includes all info about onboarded institutions linked to a user

productRole.description: The specific role of the user related to the product.

productRoleLabel.description: The specific role label of the user related to the product.

role.description: Available values: MANAGER, DELEGATE, SUB_DELEGATE, OPERATOR, ADMIN_EA

status.description:
The current status of the user on the product.
Available values: ACTIVE, PENDING, TOBEVALIDATED, SUSPENDED, DELETED, REJECTED

tokenId.description: A unique identifier for the token associated with the product.

number.description: The number of the current page

createdAt.description: Date on which the group was created

createdBy.description: User by which the group was created

members.description: List of all the members of the group

modifiedAt.description: Date on which the group was modified

modifiedBy.description: User by which the group was modified
